testsuite.name: TestCase.TestScript_007
testsuite.system-out: Creating jsonArray by adding POJO_Class_03 object one by one in order to use it as Payload in the next TestCase

The Status code of the HttpResponse received against Http-Post request having JsonArray as Payload_nestedJsonData is same as expected : 201 ResponseBody received : [{"firstName":"Vijay","lastName":"Salgaunkar","gender":"Male","age":"42.0","salary":"55000.0","address":{"street":"VascoStreet","city":"Panjim","state":"Goa","pinCode":"1100546.0"}}]
